snippet: A 20 percent stake in an offshore field being sold by Anadarko and Videocon could lead to a breakthrough for development of the country’s considerable energy resources.
abstract: Anadarko Petroleum of United States and Videocon of India put 20 percent of important natural gas field off coast of Mozambique up for sale.
lead_paragraph: A 20 percent stake in an offshore field being sold by Anadarko and Videocon could lead to a breakthrough for development of the country’s considerable energy resources.

headline.main: Anadarko and Videocon to Sell Mozambique Gas Stakes
headline.print_headline: Anadarko and Videocon to Sell Natural Gas Stake in Mozambique
